I'm going to be late!"” (when she thought about it then, it occurred to her that she should have wondered this, but at the time it all seemed quite natural); but when the Rabbit actually took a clock out of its waistcoat pocket, and looked at it, and then hurriedly, Alice began to get up, as it flashed in her mind that she had never seen a rabbit with a waistcoat pocket, or a clock to take out of it, and burning with curiosity, she ran across the field after it, and fortunately was only in time to see it pop down a large rabbit hole under the fence.
vinai/vinai-translate-vi2en-v2In another moment down went Alice after it, never once considering how in the world she was to get out again. Trong một thời điểm xuống đi Alice sau khi nó, không bao giờ một lần xem xét làm thế nào trong thế giới của cô là để có được một lần nữa.Alice went on thinking again, not once thinking of how she might escape.In another moment, Alice pursued it, never thinking about how she would return to the world.In a moment down went Alice after it, never once considering how in her world it was to get again.
vinai/vinai-translate-vi2en-v2The rabbit-hole went straight on like a tunnel for some way, and then dipped suddenly down, so suddenly that Alice had not a moment to think about stopping herself before she found herself falling down a very deep well. Lỗ thỏ đi thẳng như một đường hầm cho một số cách, và sau đó nhúng đột ngột xuống, đột ngột như vậy mà Alice đã không có một thời điểm để suy nghĩ về việc ngăn chặn chính mình trước khi cô thấy mình rơi xuống một cái giếng rất sâu.The rabbit hole went straight like a tunnel, and then suddenly sank, so suddenly that Alice didn't think to stop herself before she found herself falling into a very deep well.The rabbit hole went straight like a tunnel, and then suddenly down, so suddenly Alice had no moment to think about stopping herself before she fell into a very deep well.The rabbit hole went straight as a tunnel for some way, and then dipped suddenly down, so suddenly that Alice did not have a moment to think about stopping herself before she found herself falling into a very deep well.
vinai/vinai-translate-vi2en-v2Either the well was very deep, or she fell very slowly, for she had plenty of time as she went down to look about her and to wonder what was going to happen next. First, she tried to look down and make out what she was coming to, but it was too dark to see anything; then she looked at the sides of the well, and noticed that they were filled with cupboards and book-shelves; here and there she saw maps and pictures hung upon pegs. She took down a jar from one of the shelves as she passed; it was labelled “ORANGE MARMALADE”, but to her great disappointment it was empty: she did not like to drop the jar for fear of killing somebody underneath, so managed to put it into one of the cupboards as she fell past it.Hoặc là giếng rất sâu, hoặc là nó rơi rất chậm, bởi vì nó có rất nhiều thời gian khi đi xuống để nhìn xung quanh và tự hỏi điều gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo. Đầu tiên, nó cố gắng nhìn xuống và nhận ra những gì nó đang đến, nhưng trời quá tối để nhìn thấy bất cứ điều gì; sau đó nó nhìn vào các cạnh của giếng, và nhận thấy rằng họ đã được lấp đầy với tủ và kệ sách; ở đây và ở đó cô thấy bản đồ và hình ảnh treo trên các chốt. Cô lấy xuống một cái lọ từ một trong những kệ khi cô đi qua; nó được dán nhãn “ORANGE MARMALADE”, nhưng sự thất vọng lớn của cô là nó trống rỗng: cô không thích thả bình vì sợ giết chết ai đó bên dưới, vì vậy cô đã đặt nó vào một trong những tủ khi cô rơi qua nó.Either the well was very deep, or she fell very slowly, because she had plenty of time down there to look around and wonder what was going to happen next. First she tried to look down and realize where she was going, but it was too dark to see anything; then she looked at the sides of the well and saw that they were full of cupboards and shelves; here and there she saw maps and paintings hanging on hooks. She took a jar from one of the shelves and dropped it as she passed; it was labeled "MARMALADE OUTSIDE," but it was so empty it was disappointing: she didn't like to drop the jar for fear of killing someone underneath, so she tried to put it in one of the cupboards as she fell through it.Either the well was very deep, or she fell too slowly, because she had seen maps and pictures hanging on a bookshelf; here and realized that they had too much time to look at her and wonder what would happen next. So she put it on one of the boards as she walked by.Either the well is very deep, or it falls very slowly, because it has a lot of time when it comes down to look around and wonder what will happen next. First, it tries to look down and realize what it is coming to, but it is too dark to see anything; then it looks at the edges of the well, and notices that they have been filled with cabinets and bookshelves; here and there she sees maps and pictures hanging on the pegs. She takes down a jar from one of the shelves as she passes by; it is labeled “ORANGE MARMALADE”, but her great disappointment is that it is empty: she does not like to drop the jar for fear of killing someone underneath, so she puts it in one of the cabinets as she falls through it.
